description: Bring the outdoors in and watch your child have fun, fun, fun with our “Bugs, Bugs, Bugs” puzzle trio! Transport your child to the great outdoors anytime of the year with our colorful “Bugs, Bugs, Bugs” set of 3 puzzles for hours of quiet fun! They’ll discover a bevy of butterflies, caterpillars, bees, snails, lady beetles and other bugs and insects. Does that pink cricket look worried that the hungry slug may topple the toadstool it’s perched on? Puzzles help develop hand-eye coordination, fine motor skills, and problem-solving through repeated practice while delivering loads of fun! Our three 49-piece puzzles have handy, full-size picture guides and large, durable pieces little hands can easily hold for lots of repeat fun. Clean-cut pieces and Ravensburger’s tight interlocking fit provide a pleasurable puzzling experience for children and their adult helpers alike. With piece counts children can grow with, our Perfect Age Fit criteria ensure this puzzle is fun and educational for ages 5 and up!
